text: William Brian Kelly (25 September 1937 – March 2013) was an English professional footballer who played as a centre forward for Dover, Queens Park Rangers, Bexleyheath & Welling, Romford and Bexley United. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2013 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Dover F.C. players Category:Queens Park Rangers F.C. players Category:Bexley United F.C. players Category:Romford F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Association football forwards
title: Brian Kelly (footballer, born 1937)
